problem_names: lemma member_fs_set_permute_iff [simp]: "p \<bullet> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s p \<bullet> X \<longleftrightarrow> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s X"
lemma member_fs_set_eqvt [eqvt]: "x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s X \<Longrightarrow> p \<bullet> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s p \<bullet> X"
translations: lemma member_fs_set_permute_iff [simp]: "p \<bullet> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s p \<bullet> X \<longleftrightarrow> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s p \<bullet> X) =

lemma member_fs_set_eqvt [eqvt]: "x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s X \<Longrightarrow> p \<bullet> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s p \<bullet> X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s X \<Longrightarrow>
    p \<bullet> x \<in>\<^sub>f\<^sub>s p \<bullet> X
